name: GREEK SCAMPI
description: Our most popular! Three jumbo shrimp sautéed scampi style, served on garlic toast,then topped with melted feta & herb cheese.

name: CLAMS BIANCO (White Sauce)
description: Steamed Long Island Littlenecks finished in a zesty white wine butter sauce. Served with garlic bread for dipping.

name: CLAMS PISSCILLIPO (Red Sauce)
description: Long Island Littlenecks steamed in white wine, finished in marinara sauce. Served with garlic bread.

name: SHRIMP COCKTAIL
description: Four ice cold jumbo shrimp. Served with cocktail sauce.

name: MEATBALLS OR SAUSAGE
description: Side of homemade meatballs or locally made sausage.

name: ROASTED EGGPLANT
description: Sliced eggplant roasted, layered with ricotta, spinach, roasted red peppers, baked with mozzarella cheese, finished with marinara sauce and pesto. Served over linguine

name: CHICKEN, BROCCOLI, GARLIC & OLIVE OIL
description: A healthy combination of chicken, broccoli, garlic & olive oil tossed with penne pasta, chicken stock and Parmesan

name: CHICKEN PARMIGIANA
description: Boneless breast of chicken, hand breaded in our seasoned breadcrumbs. Baked with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce. Served with linguine

name: CHICKEN PICATTA
description: Boneless chicken breast dusted with seasoned flour and pan seared with shallots and capers finished in a white wine, lemon butter sauce.  Served over linguine...

name: CHICKEN MARSALA
description: Chicken breast sautéed with shallots, mushrooms and the best Marsala sauce in the area!  Served over linguine

name: VEAL PARMIGIANA
description: Hand cut Plume De Veau veal, lightly breaded with our flavorful breadcrumbs, topped with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce. Served with linguine

name: VEAL AND PEPPERS
description: World famous Plume De Veau veal seared then simmered in our tomato sauce, tossed with roasted green peppers and served over linguine

name: NY STRIP STEAK
description: A 16-ounce hand trimmed NY Strip Steak topped with our Montreal seasoning, then char grilled to order. Served with potato & vegetable du jour. | Add-ons: Add mushrooms $7 / Add onions $7 / Topped with crumbled Bleu Cheese $8

name: HADDOCK FRANCAISE
description: Fresh Haddock filet lightly egg battered and sautéed.  Finished with a shallot white wine butter sauce.  Served with potato and vegetable du jour

name: LEMON HADDOCK
description: A daily special...Fresh Haddock filet baked with lemon butter breadcrumbs. Served with potato and vegetable du jour

name: SHRIMP FRA DIAVOLO
description: Sautéed jumbo shrimp in a splash of sherry and a touch of olive oil, with spicy marinara sauce.  Served over linguine

name: SHRIMP & SCALLOPS MARINARA
description: Fresh sea scallops and jumbo shrimp sautéed with our own zesty marinara.  Served over linguine

name: SHRIMP GENOASE
description: Lightly battered jumbo shrimp sautéed in garlic and shallots, flamed with Sherry wine and finished with cream.  Served over linguine

name: CHEESE RAVIOLI
description: Large Queen Ann of Brooklyn ravioli filled with ricotta cheese, topped with our famous tomato sauce

name: BAKED LASAGNA
description: Our homemade lasagna... Famous for over 102 years

name: PENNELL’S OWN TOMATO SAUCE
description: A simmering recipe since 1922

name: MARINARA
description: Pennell’s own chunky and zesty marinara

name: MEATBALLS
description: Homemade and smothered with our famous tomato sauce

name: HOT SAUSAGE
description: Fresh Italian sausage with tomato sauce
